oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Christopher D. Ammons standing with a family member on the day he left for Vietnam.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Men; Soldiers
Ammons, Christopher D., 1948-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Christopher Ammons was born in Norfolk, Virginia, on April 18, 1948. He enlisted in the Army on June 1, 1967, and served with the 1st Infantry Division and later with the 194th Military Police Company. He served two tours in Vietnam, 1967-1968 and 1969-1970. His photographs show details of the daily life of soldiers in Vietnam.
